Clonezilla Live 3.3.1 Released

Clonezilla is a free and open source disk cloning and imaging utility that supports a wide range of file systems and hardware configurations. This new release includes Linux 6.18 LTS and improved BitLocker support.

The main highlight of this release is the updated Linux kernel which brings improved hardware support and better performance across a wide range of systems. Additionally BitLocker encrypted drives can now be cloned.

Users can download the new release from the official Clonezilla website. The team encourages all users to upgrade as soon as possible to benefit from the security improvements included in this release.
